verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> <S%H516>Altaschith,<s%> <S%H4387>Michtam<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> when he <S%H1272>fled<s%> from <S%H7586>Saul<s%> in the <S%H4631>cave.<s%> Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to me, O <S%H430>God,<s%> be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to me: for my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2620>trusts<s%> in you: yes, in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of your <S%H3671>wings<s%> will I make my <S%H2620>refuge,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> these <S%H1942>calamities<s%> be <S%H5674>over.<s%>
I will <S%H7121>cry<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5945>most<s%> <S%H5945>high;<s%> to <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H1584>performes<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> things for me.

He shall <S%H7971>send<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> me from the <S%H2778>reproach<s%> of him that would <S%H7602>swallow<s%> me up. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> forth his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and his <S%H571>truth.<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3833>lions:<s%> and I <S%H7901>lie<s%> even among them that are set on <S%H3857>fire,<s%> even the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> whose <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are <S%H2595>spears<s%> and <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> and their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
Be you <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> let your <S%H3519>glory<s%> be <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

They have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> a <S%H7568>net<s%> for my <S%H6471>steps;<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H3721>bowed<s%> down: they have <S%H3738>dig<s%> a <S%H7882>pit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, into the <S%H8432>middle<s%> whereof they are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> themselves. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>fixed,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>fixed:<s%> I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> and give <S%H2167>praise.<s%>
<S%H5782>Awake<s%> up, my <S%H3519>glory;<s%> <S%H5782>awake,<s%> <S%H5035>psaltery<s%> and <S%H3658>harp:<s%> I myself will <S%H5782>awake<s%> <S%H7837>early.<s%>
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> you, O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> among the <S%H5971>people:<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> to you among the <S%H3816>nations.<s%>
For your <S%H2617>mercy<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and your <S%H571>truth<s%> to the <S%H7834>clouds.<s%>
Be you <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens:<s%> let your <S%H3519>glory<s%> be <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
